name: HeadSquare - Multiplayer VR Ball Game
description: Multiplayer Ball Game. Single player mode supported. Use your head as the controller and play alone or with up to six players online. Very immersive multiplayer fun.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960/1050 or AMD RX 460/560 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space
